channel.title: Comments on: Episode #166: ATMs and ICOs

item.title: By: nelabs
item.dc:creator: nelabs
item.description: thanks for the interview. my question is following if in future we move to cryptocurrency, it will be accepted by more merchants, we will have credit cards with crypto currency. why do we need ATM, to exchange, crypto currency to fiat currency?
item.content:encoded: thanks for the interview. my question is following if in future we move to cryptocurrency, it will be accepted by more merchants, we will have credit cards with crypto currency. why do we need ATM, to exchange, crypto currency to fiat currency?
